      void delete()
      Gets the ID of an appointment to delete and sends it to the database service Notifies the user after a successful deletion.

      Resets the add/update form and buttons

      private void setTableRow()
      Sets up the mouse click action on a row

    • setTableCells

      private void setTableCells()
      Sets up the Start and End table cells to have a custom string instead of the default ZonedDateTime.toString()

    • setTimeOptions

      private void setTimeOptions()
      Sets up the time selection in the form. Will not allow an end time to be selected until a start time has been chosen.

    • populateTables

      private void populateTables()
      Populates the tables with data: on load, on create, on update, on delete, and on page change

    • reset

      private void reset()
      Resets the forms and tables. Will remain on whichever week or month that has been selected.

    • nextMonth

      private void nextMonth()
      Move the table forward a month

      Move the table backwards a month
